motionFlag.title: Motion event
motionFlag.desciption: Occurs if the device is woken due to a change in acceleration.

dayTimerFlag.title: Inactivity event
dayTimerFlag.desciption: Occurs if the device is woken due to the 24 hour since last transmit timer.

overTempFlag.title: Over temperature event
overTempFlag.desciption: Occurs if the device detected a temperature above the safe operating temperature.

tiltedFlag.title: Tilted event
tiltedFlag.desciption: Occurs if the device detects that it is operating outside of its allowed tilt angle range.

magSwitchFlag.title: Magnet switch event
magSwitchFlag.desciption: Occurs if the device was woken by the magnetic switch.

ultrasoundHWErrorFlag.title: Ultrasound Hardware Error
ultrasoundHWErrorFlag.desciption: A problem was detected with the ultrasonic hardware. Device service required.

laserHWErrorFlag.title: Laser Hardware Error
laserHWErrorFlag.desciption: A problem was detected with the laser hardware. Device service required.

accelerometerHWErrorFlag.title: Accelerometer Hardware Error
accelerometerHWErrorFlag.desciption: A problem was detected with the accelerometer. Device service required.
